STARTPAGE.TEXT: This website is intended to be a web application for reading and searching the texts of the Bonner Kant-Korpus. It is currently under development.

NOT-FOUND.TEXT: The requested page does not exist.

BUTTON.LABEL: Search
BUTTON.TOOLTIP: You must enter at least one search term and select at least one work

WORKS.TITLE: Works selection
WORKS.NO_VOLUMES: There are no works available to search

WITH_STEMMING.LABEL: Use stemmed texts
WITH_STEMMING.TOOLTIP: If the switch is on, the results does not only include exact matches, but also results where the stem of the word matches the stem of the search term. Example: Search term 'jumping' also finds matches with 'jump', 'jumps' and 'jumped'.

INCLUDE_FOOTNOTES.LABEL: Search footnotes
INCLUDE_FOOTNOTES.TOOLTIP: Footnotes are included in the search if the switch is on.

INCLUDE_HEADINGS.LABEL: Search headings
INCLUDE_HEADINGS.TOOLTIP: Headings are included in the search if the switch is on.

INCLUDE_SUMMARIES.LABEL: Search summaries
INCLUDE_SUMMARIES.TOOLTIP: Paragraph summaries are included in the search if the switch is on.

SEARCH_TIPS.TEXT: Use special characters for specialized searches: & for AND, | for OR, ! for NOT, (...) to group terms, and "..." for exact phrases. Example: (dog | "white mice") & !cat

BUTTON.DISABLED: You must enter at least one search term to update the search

BAD_REQUEST.EMPTY_WORKS_SELECTION: You must select at least one work.
BAD_REQUEST.SYNTAX.UNEXPECTED_END_OF_INPUT: Syntax error: unexpected end of input.
BAD_REQUEST.SYNTAX.WRONG_STARTING_CHAR: Syntax error: wrong starting character '{{ param0 }}'.
BAD_REQUEST.SYNTAX.WRONG_ENDING_CHAR: Syntax error: wrong ending character '{{ param0 }}'.
